Property.Name: SelectedFaceColor
Property.Desc: Sets the color of selected faces.

Property.Name: WireFrameColor
Property.Desc: Sets the color of the wireframe.

Property.Name: SelectionFillMode
Property.Desc: Sets the fill mode for selected faces.

Property.Name: SelectionTransparency
Property.Desc: Sets the transparency for selected faces.

Property.Name: VertexSize
Property.Desc: Sets the vertex size in pixels.

Property.Name: VertexColor
Property.Desc: Sets the color of unselected vertices.

Property.Name: SelectedVertexColor
Property.Desc: Sets the color of selected vertices.

Property.Name: BoneSize
Property.Desc: Sets the size of bones.

Property.Name: BoneColor
Property.Desc: Sets the color of bones.

Property.Name: SelectedBoneColor
Property.Desc: Sets the color of bones that are children of the selected bone.

Property.Name: SelectedBoneColorPrimary
Property.Desc: Sets the color of the primary selected bone.

Property.Name: GridRadius
Property.Desc: Sets the number of grid lines.

Property.Name: GridSpacing
Property.Desc: Sets the amount of space between grid lines.

Property.Name: MajorGridSpacing
Property.Desc: Sets the number of grid lines between major grid lines.

Property.Name: AxisLength
Property.Desc: Sets the length of axis lines.

Property.Name: GridColor
Property.Desc: Sets the color of the grid lines.

Property.Name: MajorGridColor
Property.Desc: Sets the color of the major grid lines.

Property.Name: SnapToGrid
Property.Desc: When True some tools will only use vertex values that correspond to grid line intersections.

Property.Name: UseAngleSnap
Property.Desc: When True some tools will only use angle values that are factors of the given SnapAngle.

Property.Name: SnapAngle
Property.Desc: When UseAngleSnap is True rotation tool angles will be a factor of this value.

Property.Name: Layout
Property.Desc: Sets the number of viewports and their placement.

Property.Name: BackColor
Property.Desc: Sets the color of the background.

Property.Name: AmbientColor
Property.Desc: Sets the color of the ambient lighting.

Property.Name: DiffuseColor
Property.Desc: Sets the color of the directional lighting.

Property.Name: ToolColor
Property.Desc: Sets the color of editor tool meshes.

Property.Name: ToolBackFaceColor
Property.Desc: Sets the color of editor tool mesh backfaces.

Property.Name: RedrawAllViewports
Property.Desc: Controls whether or not all viewports are repainted or just the focused viewport when changes are made.

Property.Name: MouseConfig
Property.Desc: Sets the mouse configuration.

Property.Name: AnimationType
Property.Desc: Sets the type of animation that will be displayed, vertex or skeletal.

Property.Name: VertexWeights
Property.Desc: Number of weighting values per vertex.

Property.Name: ShowHiddenObjects
Property.Desc: Make all hidden objects visible in the tree panes.

Property.Name: MoveAmount
Property.Desc: Sets the scale applied to view matrix translations. (e.g. right click + drag)

Property.Name: ZoomAmount
Property.Desc: Sets the scale applied to view matrix zooming. (e.g. mouse wheel in orthogonal views)

Property.Name: ForwardAmount
Property.Desc: Sets the scale applied to 3d view matrix zooming. (e.g. mouse wheel in 3d views)

Property.Name: RotateAmount
Property.Desc: Sets the scale applied to 3d view matrix rotations.

Property.Name: ReverseWheel
Property.Desc: Reverses the direction of the mouse wheel zooming.

Property.Name: ShowAttachments
Property.Desc: Sets whether or not attached characters are rendered.

Property.Name: Enabled
Property.Desc: Sets whether or not the onion skin preview will be shown.

Property.Name: NumFrames
Property.Desc: Controls the number of frames shown.

Property.Name: Direction
Property.Desc: Direction in which the overlays are shown from the current time.

Property.Name: Display
Property.Desc: Tells which frames should be previewed.

Property.Name: StartOpacity
Property.Desc: Sets the opacity for the preview frame closest to the current frame.

Property.Name: EndOpacity
Property.Desc: Sets the opacity for the preview frame farthest to the current frame.

Property.Name: ShowTree
Property.Desc: If true tools will be shown in a tree, otherwise they will be shown with a combobox and list.

Property.Name: RestoreTools
Property.Desc: If the current tool was activated with an accelerator key the previous tool will be re-selected when the accelerator is released.

Property.Name: ToolList
Property.Desc: The list of tools that is currently being displayed.

Property.Name: ShowAssignmentsBone
Property.Desc: Describes which assignments should be displayed.

Property.Name: ShowAssignmentsVertex
Property.Desc: Describes which assignments should be displayed.

Property.Name: AssignmentTransparency
Property.Desc: Controls the transparency of assignments not belonging to the selected bone.

Property.Name: MaxUndoUnits
Property.Desc: Maximum number of undo units that can be on the stack.

Property.Name: LastUndoDesc
Property.Desc: Gets the description of the undo unit at the top of the undo stack.

Property.Name: LastRedoDesc
Property.Desc: Gets the description of the redo unit at the top of the redo stack.

LuaLocalListener.Name: SetStartPointImpl
LuaLocalListener.ScriptCode:
-- this function will do a hit test on the mesh and if a face is under the mouse, -- it will be broken into 3 faces using the hit coordinates as the new vertex
local anim = editChar:GetSelAnimation() if (anim:isSet()) then editChar:SetSelAnimation(IAnimation(), selSingle) -- make sure we're looking at the initial pose viewer:Redraw(true) else local method = event.method local mesh = editChar:GetSelMesh() local skel = editChar:GetSkeleton()
local pt = vertex2d(method.x, method.y) local faceHit, coords, uv = viewer:HitTestMesh(method.pane, pt, false, mesh, matrix(), skel, 0, anim)
if (not (faceHit == -1)) then --print(string.format('face index: %s', faceHit))
-- add an undo unit mesh:CreateMeshUndoUnit(MESH_NOTIFY+MESH_UPDATE, 'Break Face')
-- add the new vertex to the mesh local v = fragVertex() v.x, v.y, v.z = coords.x, coords.y, coords.z local newVert = mesh:AddVertex(v)
local tri0 = fragTriangle() local tri1 = fragTriangle()
local verts, numVerts, tris, numTris = mesh:LockMesh()
-- get the target face local curTri = tris[faceHit]
-- copy the target face into the 2 new faces -- NOTE: tri0 = curTri will not copy the contents of the triangle, it will simply reassign tri0 to reference curTri so you must use copy tri0:copy(curTri) tri1:copy(curTri)
-- update the index and uv coords for the 3 faces curTri.index[2] = newVert curTri.uv[2] = uv
tri0.index[0] = newVert tri0.uv[0] = uv
tri1.index[1] = newVert tri1.uv[1] = uv
mesh:UnlockMesh()
-- add the new faces to the mesh mesh:AddFace(tri0) mesh:AddFace(tri1)
mesh:CreateVertexNormals(editChar:GetModel()) -- update the vertex normals
mesh:FireChangeEvent() -- notify any listeners that the mesh has changed end end

Property.Name: Origin
Property.Desc: Defines which point is the origin when drawing the new shape.

Property.Name: Create
Property.Desc: Creates the shape.

Method.Name: BeginShape
Method.Desc: Initialize parameters used to create the shape.

Method.Name: CreateShape
Method.Desc: Creates the new shape with the current tool paramters and appends it to the character's mesh.

Method.Name: UpdateTool
Method.Desc: Update the tool's parameters based on the user input.

Property.Name: CurClick
Property.Desc: Current click count.

Property.Name: NumClicks
Property.Desc: Number of clicks needed to create the shape.

HandleSetCurPoint

Property.Name: Tolerance
Property.Desc: How close the cursor needs to be to a vertex in order to select it.

Property.Name: Reset
Property.Desc: Clears the selected vertices.

Property.Name: Backfaces
Property.Desc: When true, new faces will be 2-sided.

LuaLocalListener.Name: GetNumClicks

Property.Name: Width
Property.Desc: Width of the box.

Property.Name: Height
Property.Desc: Height of the box.

Property.Name: Length
Property.Desc: Length of the box.

Property.Name: WidthSegs
Property.Desc: Number of segments along the width of the box.

Property.Name: HeightSegs
Property.Desc: Number of segments along the height of the box.

Property.Name: LengthSegs
Property.Desc: Number of segments along the length of the box.

LuaLocalListener.Name: GetNumClicks

Property.Name: Length
Property.Desc: Length of the cone.

Property.Name: Radius1
Property.Desc: Radius of the cone at the origin.

Property.Name: Radius2
Property.Desc: Radius of the cone at the opposite end.

Property.Name: LengthSegs
Property.Desc: Number of segments along the length of the cone.

Property.Name: CapSegs
Property.Desc: Number of segments in the end caps.

Property.Name: Sides
Property.Desc: Number of sides around the axis of rotation.

Property.Name: Sideways
Property.Desc: Tells whether or not to create the cone perpendicular to the viewer.

Property.Name: Sides

Property.Name: Radius

Property.Name: Subdivisions

Property.Name: BaseShape

Method.Name: CreateBone
Method.Desc: Creates a bone at the given world space coords as a child of the primary selected bone..

HandleCreate
HandleCreateBone

Command.Name: CleanAssign
Command.Desc: Make sure weight totals are valid and there are no duplicate bone influences in vertices.

Command.Name: MakeRoot
Command.Desc: Reorganizes the bone hierarchy to make the selected bone the root.

Command.Name: RemoveAlpha
Command.Desc: Removes alpha transparency from the selected texture.

Command.Name: SetColorAlpha
Command.Desc: Sets an alpha value into all occurrences of a given color in the selected texture.

ToolButton.Name: RemoveAssignments
ToolButton.Caption: Remove Bone Assignments From Selected Vertices

VertexTool.Name: Vertex
VertexTool.Desc: Create a vertex by clicking in the viewer.

FaceTool.Name: Face
FaceTool.Desc: Create a face by clicking 3 vertices.

BoneTool.Name: Bone
BoneTool.Desc: Creates a bone as a child of the primary selected bone.

BreakFace.Name: BreakFace
BreakFace.Desc: Breaks a face into 3 triangles where the button is clicked.
